section.name: Quality control step
section.p: This step allow to perform some quality controls on the output of the runs. To do this Aozan use Illumina reports, FastQC results and contamination detection results (using FastQ Screen).
This step creates a report file including the thresholds fixed for quality controls with :

ul.li: Global quality tests with Illumina reports
Lanes quality tests with Illumina reports
Projects statistics quality tests with Illumina reports, demultiplexage reports, optional samples reports
Samples statistics quality tests with Illumina reports, demultiplexage reports, optional samples reports, compile data on replica by sample only if the run contains a single Project.
Samples quality tests with Illumina reports, FastQC, a quality control tool for high throughput sequence data and a optional module for the contamination detection (reimplementation of FastqScreen).

section.p: The next table contains the globals parameters of this step.

tr.td: Enable the step. If True, at least one test (global, lane or sample) must be at 'True', otherwise none data collected for the report.
Save raw data generated for the tests
Save report data in XML format (before applying the stylesheet)
Path to the stylesheet to use
The number of core available on the system
The number of thread to use when running FastQC if tests that need FastQC are enable
